As a metaphor expert, I can analyze the language used in the tweet. The phrase "drowning in shit" and "throw us a life raft" are both negative metaphors, while "pull us out of the toilet" is a positive one. The use of these metaphors suggests a critical view of Hillary and Trump, while portraying Bernie Sanders as the best option.
#Hillary will keep us drowning in shit, #Trump will throw us a life raft, #Sanders will pull us out of the toilet completely. #election2016

As a metaphor expert, I can analyze the use of the rock metaphor in this tweet. As a metaphor expert, I can analyze the use of the word "garrote" in this tweet. It is a violent metaphor that suggests choking or strangling someone. The author seems to be using this metaphor to convey the idea that Ted Cruz would have significant power over Donald Trump if he becomes VP.
